def_cn: （与表示地点的名词连用）表示“总部设在…的”，“以…为基地的”
def_en: -based combines with nouns referring to places to mean something positioned or existing mainly in the place mentioned, or operating or organized from that place.

def_cn: （与名词连用）表示“以…为中心的”，“以…为主要部分（或特征）的”
def_en: -based combines with nouns to mean that the thing mentioned is a central part or feature.

def_cn: （与副词连用）表示“有…基础的”
def_en: -based combines with adverbs to mean having a particular kind of basis.
